message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $950000. This offer is reflective of my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the return on this valuable asset.

Alice, your offer is very compelling, but I'm looking to maximize my investment. Would you consider a price of $900000?  This would still give you a substantial profit and allow me to secure the product at a more favorable price point.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a proposal of $975000 for the product. This price reflects a balance between maximizing my return and providing you with a competitive offer. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
